channel.title: Data Science on Robert Schnitman
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on Robert Schnitman

item.title: Data Science and Beyblades
item.description: Introduction Setup libs <- c('tidyverse', 'rvest', 'magrittr', 'ggthemes', 'gridExtra', 'knitr', 'kableExtra') for (i in libs) { if (!require(i, character.only = TRUE)) { install.packages(i) library(i, character.only = TRUE) } } Wiki Mining page <- 'https://mfbeyblade.fandom.com/wiki/Beyblades' bbs <- read_html(page) %>% # List of Beyblades are...in a list. ## Find them in the list node. html_nodes("ul") %>% # Cover to text. html_text() %>% # Take out the tab separators. gsub('\t', '', .
